snippet.title: Chelsea vs. Galatasaray, 2014 UEFA Champions League: Easy win for the Blues
snippet.description:
Chelsea vs. Galatasaray, 2014 UEFA Champions League: Easy win for the Blues by Kevin McCauley on Mar 18 2014, 2:58p
Chelsea are through to the Champions League quarterfinals comfortably after a 2-0 win over Galatasaray.

snippet.title: Chelsea vs. Galatasaray: Didier Drogba returns as a potential villain
snippet.description:
Chelsea vs. Galatasaray: Didier Drogba returns as a potential villain by Kevin McCauley on Mar 17 2014, 5:23p
There are all kinds of cool elements about this tie. Chelsea has the better team and will probably win. No one cares about those things, because Didier Drogba.

snippet.title: Tottenham Hotspur and the positive side of negative goal difference
snippet.description:
Tottenham Hotspur and the positive side of negative goal difference by Andi Thomas on Mar 17 2014, 1:20p
Tottenham have had a frustrating season, yet could be on the edge of achieving something truly historical, something both unprecedented and largely irrelevant.

snippet.title: Galatasaray vs. Chelsea, 2014 UEFA Champions League: Blues do just enough in Istanbul
snippet.description:
Galatasaray vs. Chelsea, 2014 UEFA Champions League: Blues do just enough in Istanbul by Kevin McCauley on Feb 26 2014, 2:27p
Chelsea's second half performance was poor, but they're favorites in the second leg of their Champions League tie against Galatasaray after a 1-1 draw.

snippet.title: Galatasaray vs. Chelsea: Preview
snippet.description:
Galatasaray vs. Chelsea: Preview by Kevin McCauley on Feb 25 2014, 6:37p
Roberto Mancini has a versatile squad. Roberto Mancini's squad can play in any formation imaginable. But it's worth remembering that Roberto Mancini stinks in Europe.

snippet.title: Bundesliga, Week 21 preview and fixtures: Schalke aim to make a statement in Leverkusen
snippet.description:
Bundesliga, Week 21 preview and fixtures: Schalke aim to make a statement in Leverkusen by Phillip Quinn on Feb 14 2014, 1:00a
This week in the Bundesliga, Schalke will look to prove that they belong with the elite when the visit Bayern Leverkusen.

snippet.title: West Bromwich Albion vs. Chelsea: Preview and TV schedule
snippet.description:
West Bromwich Albion vs. Chelsea: Preview and TV schedule by Zach Woosley on Feb 11 2014, 3:01a
Chelsea has ascended to the top of the Premier League table and will look to stay there with a won over West Brom.

snippet.title: Saturday Premier League takeaways: Arsenal dumbfounding, Eden Hazard a golden god
snippet.description:
Saturday Premier League takeaways: Arsenal dumbfounding, Eden Hazard a golden god by Kevin McCauley on Feb 8 2014, 2:28p
Eden Hazard's hat trick against Newcastle put him on the Premier League's Mount Rushmore, while Arsenal's collapse against Liverpool defies explanation.

snippet.title: MLS expansion to Atlanta would be a mistake
snippet.description:
MLS expansion to Atlanta would be a mistake by Jeremiah Oshan on Feb 10 2014, 12:33p
While the city has a willing ownership group and a stadium that seems passable, there's very little reason to believe that a MLS team would be successful there.

snippet.title: Chelsea's transfers have made them, not Manchester City, favourites for the title
snippet.description:
Chelsea's transfers have made them, not Manchester City, favourites for the title by Callum Hamilton on Feb 6 2014, 11:24a
Chelsea have perhaps made themselves favourites for the Premier League title after their win at Manchester City, and it's the respective transfer policies of both sides with which a good portion of...
